p: Between November 2018 and August 2019, 143 RVF human cases were reported. The epidemic peaked in mid-February (February 11–17, 2019), with 18 weekly confirmed cases, six to 7 wk following the rainfall peak ( Fig. 1 A ). About two-thirds of investigated cases reported a direct contact with livestock or its tissues (including milk consumption) (68%, n = 86), while 32% ( n = 41) reported no previous contact with animals ( Fig. 1 A– C , cases in red and green, respectively).
